title: Home Run Baker back run break up - mid tier backs
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: Home Run Baker back run break up - mid tier backs
posts.post_content:
Letting go of my little Home Run Baker run.  Price all include shipping but assume FF payment.  Goods please add 3%.

Cycle 460 SGC 2.5 - sold
Piedmont 350 SGC 4 - sold
Sweet Cap 460.42 SGC 4 - sold
Old Mill SGC 2 - $250
Piedmont 460 SGC 1.5 - sold

American Beauty 350 no frame trim looks GD (ex SGC A) - sold
El Principe de Gales VG front mark back (ex SGC 20) - sent to sgc
Old Mill GD (ex PSA 2) - sent to sgc
Tolstoi GD (ex PSA 2) - sent to sgc
Piedmont 42 PR-FR - sent to sgc
Polar Bear FR-GD - sold
Sweet Cap 350.30 FR (ex PSA 1.5) - $130
Sweet Cap 460.25 looks GD has erase mark - sold

bump 2 left!

Old Mill SGC 2 - $250
Sweet Cap 350.30 FR (ex PSA 1.5) - $130
